tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE UserInteractionData (
    user_id UUID,
    item_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_type VARCHAR,
    rating INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, item_id, timestamp)
);

CREATE TABLE user_interactions (
  user_id UUID,
  item_id UUID,
  interaction_type VARCHAR,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (user_id, item_id)
);

CREATE TABLE UserProfiles (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR,
  location VARCHAR)

CREATE TABLE UserInteractions (interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  item_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  interaction_type VARCHAR)

CREATE TABLE Items (item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  category VARCHAR,
  description TEXT)

CREATE TABLE RecommenderLogs (log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  item_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  action VARCHAR)

CREATE TABLE Ratings (
    rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    item_id INT,
    rating DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
